item.title: Brooklyn
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml rye whisky
  • 20 ml dry vermouth
  • 10 ml amaro
  • 5 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve up.
  3. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Martini
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml dry vermouth
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) lemon twist
  • (garnish) olives

Instructions

  1. Make sure the drink and glass are cold.
  2. Stir ingredients.
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.

item.title: Old pal
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml rye whisky
  • 30 ml Campari
  • 30 ml dry vermouth
  • (garnish) orange slice

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with orange slice.

item.title: Scofflaw
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml rye whisky
  • 25 ml dry vermouth
  • 10 ml grenadine
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.
